forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a high near 64. Northwest wind around 8 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 49. Northwest wind 3 to 7 mph.

weather_report:
As the afternoon unfolds in Boston, a muted gray tapestry of clouds drapes the city, hinting at a day caught in the balance between warmth and chill. The air carries a gentle northwest breeze, ruffling leaves without making them dance, while the temperature hovers comfortably around 64 degrees. Tonight, as darkness settles, the clouds will continue their watch, bringing the mercury down to the cusp of cool with a low around 49. As the sky transitions, a light northwest wind will linger, softening the edges of the evening.

In this atmosphere, one might find solace in a stroll along the Charles, where the water reflects the subdued light, or perhaps venture to one of the cozy local cafés, where scents of roasted beans mingle with the murmur of quiet conversation. A light jacket or cardigan would be most suitable to ward off the chill as the sun recedes, creating a comforting layer against the encroaching coolness. So, while the skies may lack the vibrancy of a sunlit day, the allure of this afternoon lies in the understated serenity it offers, presenting an invitation to pause, reflect, and enjoy the quieter moments of life in this historic city.
